basics.name: Ze Long
basics.label: Business Analytics Candidate
basics.summary: I am studying for a M.S. in Business Analytics at the University of Rochester. I expect to graduate in December, 2020.

courses: core statistics for MS using R

highlights: Using Python to scrape finance data from Yahoo Finance and Investing.com, helping the company save about 40 percent of its research costs.
Working with Scikit-Learn to build regression models. Forecasting the revenue and profit of multiple target companies to ensure the return on investment is more than 20%
Assisted students to improve their skills in business analytics including SQL, R, and Tableau.
Regularly met with students and helped them solve academic problems.
Used SQL to retrieve key indicators from databases. Cleaned sales and membership data with Excel.
Analyzed the sales data of online stores and over 1,000 offline stores.
Utilized Google Analytics to monitor website data and analyze the potential impact behind the trend.

Conducted statistical tests (T-test, chi-square test) on more than 50,000 sales data to analyze the impact of different promotion methods on sales amount, and helped the sales team to develop marketing strategies

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: With the most accurate model, won first place in the case competition forecasting the sales of Nintendo Switch in America.

awards.title: Outstanding Student Leader
awards.awarder: Southwestern University of Finance and Economics
awards.summary: Led an 80-people organization to maintain and update student portal. Operated an official account on social media with more than 20,000 followers.

awards.title: B+ Academic Scholarship
awards.awarder: Southwestern University of Finance and Economics
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students in the top 16% of their major.
